entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
